name: Dino Race
description:
The game has originally been made for Android, so if you like it, don't hesitate to download it for free on your phone :) : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.redowlstudio.DinoRace

Dino race is a game of time trial where you can choose one of the 3 dinosaures currently available: T-rex, Velociraptor and Triceratops. Each dinosaure has its own strengths, so changing dinosaure offers you different style of playing.
4 tracks are currently available where you should try to do the best time possible to complete the objectives of each track. Every dinosaures has its own objectives.

Don't hesitate to give us your feedback so we can think about adding new features. We think for example at adding races with bots to play against.

Have fun !

Controls: Arrow Keys (up: aceleration, down: break, left and right to turn)
